    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Asteroids
    The Asteroids class manages the creation and rendering of asteroid sprites in the game.
    AuthenticationException
    AuthenticationException.java
    Exception thrown to indicate an authentication error occurred during the sign-in process.
    AuthenticationManager
     
    Blackholes
    The Blackholes class is responsible for handling the rendering of blackhole sprites in the game.
    Bullets
    The Bullets class manages the rendering of bullet sprites in the game.
    ButtonUtils
    Utility class for creating buttons in a LibGDX application.
    ClientFirebase

    Coordinate
     
    CoordinateTest
     
    Enemies
    The Enemies class handles the rendering of enemy sprites in the game.

    FirebaseAuthenticationException
    FirebaseAuthenticationException.java
    Exception thrown to indicate an authentication error occurred during the sign-in process.

    GameplayStage
     
    HealthBar
    HealthBar is a UI component that visually represents a player's health using a series of heart icons (full, half, and empty).

    HTTPRequest
     
    HTTPRequest
     
    HttpResponse
     
    InvalidScreen
    Exception thrown to indicate an invalid screen state error occurred during the set-screen process.

    Utility class for creating labels in a LibGDX application.

    The Powerups class handles the rendering of powerup sprites (such as attack, health, and bonus powerups).

    SliderUtils

    The Spaceships class handles the rendering of spaceship sprites.

    UIStage
    UIStage is a custom Stage that contains UI elements for the Space Invaders game, such as a health bar, a pause button, and a countdown timer.
